name: V.I.P.
description:
Welcome To V.I.P aka VR In Progress. 

This game was developed by 80% by myself with the help of Matthew Merino (most sounds made by him) and Hunter Jacobs(Castle Maker). 

This game holds various mechanics from physical crafting, Enemies, Potions (Slow Down time potion), Mining, Woodcutting, and all the way to a terrain generator making the game forever different each playthrough.  

All of this was completed in 1 month starting at Feb 27th - Mar 28th. 

Hope you enjoy :D more to come from myself and my future company J.U.M. Corp :D. 

(P.S. Also huge thanks to Auto Hand Asset for making this possible :D)
